member.name: T:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.ICentroidApd2
P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.ICentroidApd2.IsIsotopicallyResolved
member.summary:
Get access to the flag whether this peak has been isotopically resolved. As consequence, an , if assigned and given, will also have this flag assigned and monoisotopic mass was calculated if set to true. The cross-correlation factor is also set in IChargeEnvelopeApd2.
The value will be null if no APD information is stored in the raw file.

member.name: T:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.IChargeEnvelopeApd2
P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.IChargeEnvelopeApd2.IsIsotopicallyResolved
member.summary: Is this charge envelope created using isotopically resolved species? If so, will return the non-zero value, but will return 0.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.IChargeEnvelopeApd2.AverageMass
member.summary: When peaks are non-isotopically resolved, this value contains the average mass of all species in the envelope.

member.name: T:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.SpectrumFormat_V1_1.Properties.Resources.link
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).
